document.masterDocTitle: A check-list of Ensifera from Algeria (Insecta: Orthoptera)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A check-list of Ensifera from Algeria (Insecta: Orthoptera)

subSubSection.paragraph: Biogeographic zones: Shoreline, Tellian Atlas, High Plateaux. Bioclimatic zones: Subhumid, semiarid.

caption.paragraph: TABLE 1. Distribution of the 62 species/subspecies of Grylloidea listed in Algeria through the six biogeographic zones. Symbols: •, Shoreline;, Tellian Atlas;, High Plateaux;, Saharian Atlas;, Northern Sahara;, Central Sahara;?, uncertain distribution.

subSubSection.paragraph:
